issues.description: The UML in the problem statement and the solution reference a method named addToStockIngredients(StockIngredient), but the template’s Stock class only provides addItem(StockIngredient). Students following the UML will try to call addToStockIngredients, which does not exist in the template. This mismatch will cause confusion and compilation errors.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the template method addItem to addToStockIngredients (or add an overload) so that its name matches the UML specification and the solution implementation.
